amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exemption for communications pertaining to workers, farmers, families, and individuals.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record February 12, 2002 exempting from the bill any communication/advertisement that consists of information or commentary about a person holding or seeking federal office on any matter pertaining to workers, farmers or families.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Combest amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 237 (Roll no. 27).
